en.paymentText:
İptal Koşulları:

Sipariş adımlarını tamamlayarak ödemenizi gerçekleştirdikten sonra siparişinizin iptali için talep oluşturabilirsiniz. Talebinizi oluşturmak için sipariş numaranızla birlikte 0850 755 9987 numaralı İletişim Merkezimizi aramanız gerekmektedir. İptal talepleri İletişim Formumuz üzerinden yapılamamaktadır. İptal talepleri yalnızca siparişinizde bulunan ürünlerin depomuzda toplanma işlemi başlamamışsa değerlendirmeye alınabilmektedir. Sipariş verdiğiniz ürünlerin toplanma süreci başladıktan sonra iptal işlemi yapılamamaktadır. Böyle durumlarda iade talebi oluşturabilirsiniz.

İade Koşulları:

Sitemiz üzerinden vermiş olduğunuz siparişlerle ilgili iade taleplerinizi sipariş numaranız ile birlikte 0850 755 9987 numaralı İletişim Merkezi hattımızı arayarak oluşturabilirsiniz. İade talebinizin olumlu sonuçlanması durumunda İletişim Merkezimizin sağlayacağı Kargo İade kodunu kullanarak Yurtiçi Kargo ile satın almış olduğunuz ürünleri iade edebilirsiniz. Ambalajı açılmış, kullanılmış ya da tekrar satışa engel durumu olan ürünler için iade işlemi yapılamamaktadır.Şampuan, duş jeli, cilt ve saç bakım ürünleri gibi iadesi sağlık ve hijyen açısından uygun olmayan ürünler için iade yapılamamaktadır. Koruma ambalajı bulunan makyaj, cilt bakım ürünlerinde de koruma bandı açıldığı takdirde iade işlemi yapılamamaktadır. İade etmek istediğiniz ürünlerin bu koşulları karşılamaması durumunda iade onayı iptal edilerek Yurtiçi Kargo ile ürünleriniz Alıcı Ödemeli olarak tarafınıza gönderilecektir. İptal ve iade süreçleri hakkında detaylı bilgi için İptal & İade sayfamızı ziyaret edebilirsiniz.

defaultPropValues.content:
SİPARİŞ VE ÖDEME SEÇENEKLERİ

Watsons.com.tr’de bulunan binlerce ürün arasından dilediğinizi sepetinize ekledikten sonra sipariş adımlarını takip ederek satın alabilirsiniz. Sipariş adımlarıyla ilgili ayrıntılı bilgi için Sıkça Sorulan Sorular bölümümüze göz atabilir ya da İletişim Formu aracılığıyla bize ulaşabilirsiniz.

Siparişinizin son adımını ödeme oluşturacaktır. Watsons.com.tr’de aşağıdaki ödeme yöntemlerini kullanabilirsiniz:
 

Kredi Kartıyla Ödeme:
Watsons.com.tr’den verdiğiniz siparişlerin ödemesini kredi kartıyla online olarak yapabilirsiniz.
 

Taksitli Alışveriş:
27 Eylül 2016 tarihli, 29840 Sayılı Resmi Gazete’de yayınlanan; Banka Kartları ve Kredi Kartları Hakkında Yönetmelikte Değişiklik Yapılmasına İlişkin Yönetmelik Madde 1 uyarınca, Bankacılık Düzenleme ve Denetleme Kurumu (BDDK) tarafından yapılan uygulama nedeniyle içerisinde bulunduğumuz iş kolunda tüm banka kartları ve kredi kartlarına taksitlendirme uygulaması kaldırılmıştır.

formRule.emailRule: Please enter a valid email address

defaultPropValues.pageContent:
Acceptance of Terms

By accessing and using this platform, you confirm your agreement to be legally bound by these terms. Continued use constitutes ongoing acceptance of any revised provisions. Failure to comply requires immediate termination of all services.

Parties' Responsibilities

The company reserves the right to modify product specifications without prior notice. Users are strictly prohibited from engaging in unauthorized commercial activities through the platform. Technical support is excluded during scheduled maintenance periods.

Intellectual Property Rights

All visual assets including logos and interface designs constitute registered trademarks. Reverse engineering of any platform components will result in immediate legal action. Limited personal use exceptions require written authorization.

Privacy & Confidential Information

User data collection focuses exclusively on transaction processing requirements. Third-party data sharing occurs only with verified logistics partners. Mandatory disclosure obligations to regulatory bodies supersede standard privacy protocols.

User Registration & Security

Account credentials must contain multifactor authentication within 30 days of registration. Immediate notification is required for suspected security breaches. Inactive accounts exceeding 18 months will be permanently archived.

Force Majeure

Service interruptions caused by extreme weather events or government mandates exempt the company from liability. Affected users will receive priority service restoration when operations resume.

Agreement Validity

Should any clause be deemed unenforceable by competent authorities, remaining provisions retain full legal effect. Disputes must be formally filed within 90 calendar days of incident occurrence.

Amendments to Terms

Significant changes to service conditions trigger mandatory user notifications through registered communication channels. Historical version tracking is available through the legal documentation archive.

Notifications

Official communications utilize encrypted channels verified through blockchain timestamps. Users must maintain current contact details with real-time update capabilities through the account management portal.

General Terms of Use

Commercial-scale data scraping requires explicit written consent. Artificial inflation of engagement metrics will result in permanent account suspension. All user-generated content is subject to automated plagiarism detection protocols.

propValues.pageContent:
When will my order be shipped?

Your order will be processed and shipped within 1–3 business days after confirmation. During promotional periods, processing times may vary.

How much is the shipping fee?

Shipping is free for orders above a certain amount. For orders below that amount, a flat shipping fee applies. For more details, please visit our [Shipping Information] page.

How can I return a product?

If you wish to return a product, you can do so within 14 days from the delivery date, provided it is unused and in its original packaging with the invoice. Visit our [Returns & Exchanges] page for full instructions.

What payment methods do you accept?

We accept credit cards, debit cards, and cash on delivery. In some cases, bank transfer may also be available during certain periods.

Can I place an order without creating an account?

Yes, you can checkout as a guest without registering. However, creating an account makes it easier to track your orders and access special offers.

My item arrived damaged, what should I do?

Please take photos of the damaged item and contact our customer service within 48 hours. Once reviewed, we’ll assist you with a replacement or refund process.

propValues.pageContent:
1. Definitions
The term “Company” refers to [Company Name]; “User” means the individual accessing or using the Service; and “Service” refers to the website or mobile application. 


2. Acceptance and Validity
You agree to these Terms & Conditions (hereinafter “Terms”) by accessing or using the Service. Any changes to the Terms take effect as soon as they are posted on the website; your continued use of the Service constitutes acceptance of the updated Terms. 


3. Access and Use of the Service
You may use the Service only for lawful and permitted purposes. The following actions are prohibited:

Misusing, damaging, or interfering with the Service

Unauthorized access attempts or security breaches

Spamming, fraudulent registrations, or automated bots

Infringing on copyright, trademark, or other intellectual property rights 

4. Membership and Account Security
You must provide accurate, current, and complete information to access portions of the Service requiring registration. You are solely responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account credentials; you must promptly notify the Company of any suspected security breach. 


5. Intellectual Property
All content on the site, including text, graphics, logos, images, trademarks, and software, is the property of the Company or its licensors. Unauthorized copying, distribution, reproduction, or derivative works are prohibited. 

6. Third-Party Links
Links to third-party websites or resources on the Service are provided for informational purposes only. The Company is not responsible for the content of these sites and does not endorse or guarantee them.
 

7. Disclaimer of Warranty and Limitation of Liability
The Service is provided “as is” and “as available.” The Company makes no warranty that the Service will be uninterrupted or error-free. Under no circumstances shall the Company be liable for any indirect, incidental, or special damages. 

8. Dispute Resolution and Governing Law
These Terms are governed by the laws of the Republic of Turkey. Any disputes between the parties shall be subject to the jurisdiction of the Istanbul (Anatolian) Courthouses and Enforcement Offices.
 

9. Modification of Terms
The Company reserves the right to update these Terms at any time. Changes become effective upon publication on the website, and your continued use of the Service will be governed by the updated Terms.

propValues.pageContent:
Disclaimer for Natural Dietary Supplements

We provide high quality, natural and halal nutritional dietary supplements aimed at supporting health and well-being. Please read this disclaimer carefully before using or consuming any of our products. By using or purchasing any of our products, you agree to this disclaimer and fully accept its terms.

This disclaimer should not be considered a substitute for consulting a qualified medical professional. It is strongly recommended to consult a doctor before using any dietary supplement, especially if you have any existing health conditions or are taking other medications.

Our products are produced from natural ingredients, following the highest quality standards. However, individual tolerance and responses to dietary supplements may vary. We do not guarantee individual results and do not take responsibility for any unexpected side effects.

Please read the list of ingredients and usage instructions on the packaging carefully before using the product. Some products may contain ingredients that could cause allergies in certain individuals.

Products should be stored in a cool, dry place, and kept out of reach of children.

Our products are not intended to be a substitute for a healthy and balanced diet but should be part of a healthy lifestyle.

The use of our products is prohibited for individuals below the age of maturity, pregnant or breastfeeding women without consulting a doctor.

By using any of our products, you acknowledge that you agree to this disclaimer and accept its terms. If you do not agree with these conditions, please refrain from using our products. Feel free to contact us if you have any questions or need further information.

UMUT TUNÇDEMİR - MELETI ORIENT İTH. İHR. TİC.

Muratpaşa mah. 561.sokak 41/B Antalya / Turkey

Website: www.meritcosmetics.com
Phone: (+90) 5365130105
E-mail: info@meritcosmetics.com
